chapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Yujin Mikotoba
characters.description1: A medical professor at the Imperial Yumei University. He is an authority in forensic science in charge of the university's laboratory. He also happens to be my father.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Rei Membami
characters.description1: An assistant to my father in his laboratory at the Imperial Yumei University. She's my best friend, and considers herself very much indebted to the late Dr John Wilson.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Jezaille Brett
characters.description1: The victim of the case who was a former British exchange student. Nine months ago, she was found guilty of the murder of visiting professor Dr John Wilson.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Taketsuchi Auchi
characters.description1: The lead prosecutor of this case, who appears to be struggling to accept the changes afoot as a result of these turbulent new times in Japan - the Meiji era.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Satoru Hosonaga
characters.description1: A chief inspector in the Imperial Police Bureau who was surreptitiously submerged in the sea in order to keep watch over Miss Brett. He was present at the time of her murder.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Soseki Natsume
characters.description1: A former visiting student to the British empire who returned to Japan after a spell of bad luck with the law. He's now a successful author and a witness in the current case.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney
characters.name: Raiten Menimemo
characters.description1: A journalist for the Shoyu News who's currently following Soseki-san everywhere, reporting on his every move. As a result, he's an eyewitness to the incident.

chapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: A judicial assistant sent to Britain on a study tour. She's the epitome of a refined Japanese lady and a huge help to me always.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Iris Wilson
characters.description1: An extraordinary young girl who lives with Mr Sholmes. She has a degree in medicine and is the author of a popular series of short stories.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Herlock Sholmes
characters.description1: There's not a person in the world who hasn't heard of this famous great detective, whose deductions never fail to surprise.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Olive Green
characters.description1: An art-school student whose ambition is to become an artist. She's just regained consciousness, having been comatose for days after suffering a stab to from the back.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Soseki Natsume
characters.description1: A Japanese scholar sent to London to further his research into the English language. He's just been acquitted of a very serious crime.↳A Japanese scholar sent to London to further his research into the English language. He's just been acquitted of a very serious crime, but now finds himself accused of another.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Tobias Gregson
characters.description1: The detective inspector in charge of Scotland Yard's investigation of the case. He's stern and single-minded in his approach, and a great lover of fish and chips.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: William Shamspeare
characters.description1: The victim of the current case - a failed actor renting a room in the same building as Mr Natsume's lodgings.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: John Garrideb
characters.description1: A retired army man who's the landlord of the lodgings rented by the defendant, Mr Natsume. An old knee injury means he's confined to a chair most of the time.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Barok van Zieks
characters.description1: A prosecutor known as the Reaper of the Bailey. Supposedly, the souls of those he prosecutes are eternally damned, one way or another.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Adron B. Metermann
characters.description1: A young man who works for Altamont Gas. He's a witness to the incident.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Quinby Altamont
characters.description1: The wife of the owner of the Altamont Gas Company. She's a staunch believer in the superiority of the fuel and utterly unforgiving of gas theft.

characters.currentChapter: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Duncan Ross
characters.description1: The love of Miss Green's life, who sadly passed away a month ago as a result of gas poisoning.

chapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: A judicial assistant sent to Britain on a study tour. She's the epitome of a refined Japanese lady and a huge help to me always.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Iris Wilson
characters.description1: An extraordinary young girl who lives with Mr Sholmes. She has a degree in medicine and is the author of a popular series of short stories.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Herlock Sholmes
characters.description1: There's not a person in the world who hasn't heard of this famous great detective, whose deductions never fail to surprise.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Mael Stronghart
characters.description1: The Lord Chief Justice, who wields absolute authority in judicial matters, including the appointment of lawyers. He's a thoroughly intimidating man.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Odie Asman
characters.description1: The man who perished in the explosion on the experimentation stage at the Great Exhibition of London.↳The man who perished in the explosion on the experimentation stage. He was Professor Harebrayne's financial backer and the boss of a large criminal organisation.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Albert Harebrayne
characters.description1: A scientist who invented a machine to demonstrate super-high-voltage instantaneous kinesis. However, it exploded in use, and he is now accused of murder.↳A scientist who invented a machine to demonstrate super-high-voltage instantaneous kinesis. He's the defendant of this case and a friend to Lord van Zieks, apparently.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Barok van Zieks
characters.description1: A prosecutor known as the Reaper of the Bailey. Supposedly, the souls of those he prosecutes are eternally damned, one way or another.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Masked Man
characters.description1: An apprentice of Lord van Zieks whose face is always covered by a mask. He has the air of a completely unassailable man.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Gina Lestrade
characters.description1: A mostly reformed pickpocket who's now a self-appointed 'detective inspector'. She's really making waves in her new apprenticeship.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Tobias Gregson
characters.description1: The detective inspector in charge of Scotland Yard's investigation of the case. He's stern and single-minded in his approach, and a great lover of fish and chips.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Esmeralda Tusspells
characters.description1: The proprietress of the Madame Tusspells Museum of Waxwork and the latest in a line of artisans privy to the secret Tusspells technique of capturing a perfect likeness.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Balthazar Lune
characters.description1: The impresario of short pleasure voyages in flying balloons. The balloons above the experimentation state all belonged to this man.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Bohemian Boy
characters.description1: A young boy who came to London to visit the Great Exhibition. His real name is Wilhelm Gottsreich Sigismond Ormstein.↳A young prince from the royal family of Bohemia with an excessively long name. He witnessed the explosion at the Great Exhibition.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Courtney Sithe
characters.description1: Scotland Yard coroner, leader of the Forensic Investigation Team and one of Lord Stronghart's most trusted allies.

characters.currentChapter: The Return of the Great Departed Soul
characters.name: Enoch Drebber
characters.description1: A trickster who seems to be both an engineer and a magician. He constructed the machine for Professor Harebrayne's demonstration.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Seishiro Jigoku
characters.description1: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and a judge of the Supreme Court of Judicature in Japan. He's the man who acquitted me when I was once accused of murder.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Mael Stronghart
characters.description1: The Lord Chief Justice, who wields absolute authority in judicial matters, including the appointment of lawyers. He's a thoroughly intimidating man.

characters.description1: A prosecutor known as the Reaper of the Bailey. Supposedly, the souls of those he prosecutes are eternally damned, one way or another.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Gina Lestrade
characters.description1: A mostly reformed pickpocket who's now a self-appointed 'detective inspector'. She's really making waves in her new apprenticeship.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Evie Vigil
characters.description1: A client who has engaged the services of Mr Sholmes. She has asked the great detective to help track down her missing husband.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Daley Vigil
characters.description1: A man who's disappeared without a word to his family. He was the former chief warder of Barclay Prison.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Barry Caidin
characters.description1: The governor of Barclay Prison. It seems he was good friends with Professor Mikotoba during the Japanese man's time in Britain as a visiting student.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Tobias Gregson
characters.description1: A murdered Scotland Yard inspector. He was stern and single-minded in his approach, and a great lover of fish and chips.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Kazuma Asogi
characters.description1: My best friend, who I had believed to be dead. He lost his memory somehow, but has now materialised as a prosecutor in the British courts.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Gossip
characters.description1: A pedlar plying his trade on Fresno Street. He seems to make his money selling interesting items of news to passers-by.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Venus
characters.description1: A pedlar plying her trade on Fresno Street. She seems to make her money selling meagre little fireworks to children.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Sandwich
characters.description1: A mysterious 'signpost' who can be found on Fresno street. He looks familiar somehow...

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Fabien de Rousseau
characters.description1: The fraudster behind the Red-Headed League swindle, who was caught by Mr Sholmes. He derives from the French aristocracy, it seems.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Peppino de Rossi
characters.description1: A lackey of de Rousseau and conspirator in the Red-Headed League swindle. The third son of a great Italian landowner.

characters.currentChapter: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow
characters.name: Maria Gorey
characters.description1: The daughter of Dr Sithe who's also a coroner like her mother. She carries out all the autopsy work on corpses.
